DOC.brief_summary: This study seek evaluate impact intensive home-based education intervention target severely stunt Guatemalan child catch growth improved development . Half child study receive standard care , include micronutrient supplementation food ration . The half child study receive , addition , home-based dietary assessment individualize parental nutrition education .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Physical Growth Positive Development Severely Stunted Guatemalan Children
DOC.criteria: Child age 624 month time enrollment Height/length age Z score le 2.5 Child live parent/legal guardian Presence acute malnutrition ( weight length/height Z score le 2 ) Presence severe medical illness ( e.g . congenital heart disease , genetic abnormality )
